name: F2. Kevin and Binary String (Hard Version)
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line contains the number of test cases $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \le t \le 10^4$$$). The description of the test cases follows. The first line of each test case contains a string $$$s$$$ consisting of '0' and '1'.The second line of each test case contains a string $$$t$$$ consisting of '0', '1' and '?'.It is guaranteed that the lengths of $$$s$$$ and $$$t$$$ are the same.It is guaranteed that the sum of the length of $$$s$$$ over all test cases will not exceed $$$4\cdot 10^5$$$.
output: OutputFor each test case, output one integer — the minimum number of operations required. If it is impossible, output $$$-1$$$.
